pr_title: SONARJAVA-3253 filter out queries from S2068

timeline.bodyText:
This use case is not limited to :param but to :something. This is to avoid FP when literal string is an Hibernate query parameters.
https://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/orm/3.2/api/org/hibernate/Query.html
I added a comment in the code sample of SONARJAVA-3253
timeline.author: pierre-loup-tristant-sonarsource

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the feedback. fix on his way. It was not obvious to me from the description.
replies.author: m-g-sonar
